content.raw:
@hsu is the gazebo rtql8 branch supposed to compile as it? Or is lacking of the proper CMakeLists.txt support?

```
# find . -name CMakeLists.txt -exec grep -nHi rtql {} \;
./gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:8:if (HAVE_RTQL8)
./gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:9:  add_subdirectory(rtql8)
./gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:115:if (HAVE_RTQL8)
./gazebo/physics/CMakeLists.txt:116:  target_link_libraries(gazebo_physics gazebo_physics_rtql8)
```
Do you want me to fix?
